author: Juha Haataja
content:
So now that you have a great monitor you discover that your camera/lens/... just doesn't cut it.

The same thing that happens with high-end audio equipment: first you buy good headphones and realize that the loudspeakers you have are not that good, and get new ones; then you realize that the amplifier/digital cables/... need an upgrade as well. 

I sense several new chapters in this story. ;-)

Anyway, Happy New Year to You!
